segment.source: Before you request that a Group Policy Object (GPO) be deployed to the production environment, you should test the GPO in a lab environment.
segment.target: Before you request that a Group Policy Object (GPO) be deployed to the production environment, you should test the GPO in a lab environment.

segment.source: If you develop the GPO in a domain in a test forest, you can export the GPO to a file and import the file to a domain in the production forest.
segment.target: If you develop the GPO in a domain in a test forest, you can export the GPO to a file and import the file to a domain in the production forest.

segment.source: You can then test the GPO by linking it to an organizational unit (OU) that contains test computers and users.
segment.target: You can then test the GPO by linking it to an organizational unit (OU) that contains test computers and users.

segment.source: Export a GPO to a File
segment.target: Export a GPO to a File

segment.source: Import a GPO from a File
segment.target: Import a GPO from a File

segment.source: Test a GPO in a Separate Organizational Unit
segment.target: Test a GPO in a Separate Organizational Unit

segment.source: You can also import a GPO from the production environment of the domain.
segment.target: You can also import a GPO from the production environment of the domain.

segment.source: For more information, see Import a GPO from Production.
segment.target: For more information, see Import a GPO from Production.
